term.doneNotDoneExplain: Example: I will finish development by 2023-12-31. (Actions can be added to this milestone.)
term.countExplain: Example: I will talk to 10 people about my App by 2021-12-31

slogan.removeWTD: Are you sure you want to remove this action as {{taskType}}?
slogan.noFavorite: use <fn/> to mark a project as favorite.
slogan.noFavoriteProject: You have not selected your favorite projec yet.
slogan.favoriteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to set this project as the favorite?
slogan.unFavoriteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to unfavorite this project?
slogan.favoriteConfirmMessage: This will remove the favorite status from any other project.
slogan.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this?
slogan.deleteRelatedItem: Related actions, thoughts and milestones will be deleted as well.
slogan.setAsCompleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to mark this as complete?
slogan.setAsActiveConfirm: Are you sure you want to mark this as active?
slogan.noActionToMilestone: You have not added any action to the milestone
slogan.exitWarning: Are you sure you want to end?
slogan.agreement: By registering, you agree to Zensive's
slogan.linkSent: Email has been sent. Check if it is in spam folder.

varibaleStr.worked: You have worked <bold>{{count}} min</bold> so far.
varibaleStr.workedPrevious: You worked <bold>{{count}} min</bold> the day before.

placeholder.notToDo: Things that I refrain from doing
placeholder.gainByMe: What will I gain by achieving this goal
placeholder.gainByOther: Who can benefit and what by me achieving this goal
placeholder.willingTo: What am I willing to do to achieve this goal

error.updateFailed: Failed to update, please try again later
error.deleteFailed: Failed to delete, please try again later
error.noAgreement: Please agree to the terms and conditions.

onboarding.coulddoDescription: Capture all your [could do] here. You stop them from cluttering your mind and create a buffer between thoughts and action.
onboarding.woulddoDescription: Select your [would do] from your [could do] with thoughtfulness.
onboarding.shoulddoDescription: Prioritize your day with one [crucial] and two [important] instead of endless to-dos.
onboarding.theDoingDescription: Break your task into action pieces and stay focused with a timer.
onboarding.tourWelcome: how Zensive can help you achieve your goals.
onboarding.favoriteProject: The favorite project is one and only.
onboarding.favoriteProjectBenefit: to help you identify and focus on the most important project.
onboarding.folder: A project is divided into different folders. Each action is created under respective folder.
onboarding.folderBenefit: to help you organize and track your actions effectively.
onboarding.ultimateGoal: This is the project's ultimate goal
onboarding.ultimateGoalBenefit: to help you turn your project into specific, measurable and time-bound.
onboarding.plan: Edit your goal and plan manifesto.
onboarding.planBenefit: to help you clarify your goal with its due date and significance.
onboarding.milestone: Each milestone is a solid step towards your goal.
onboarding.milestoneBenefit: to help you break down your ambitious goal into smaller, more reachable steps so more clarity and motivation.
onboarding.doneNotDoneDescription: A collection of actions from different folders. You manually toggle the milestone complete.
onboarding.countDescription: You keep track of the count. Once you reach the target, the milestone is automatically marked as complete.
onboarding.dateProgressBar: This is the date progress bar. It shows you how much time you have left to complete this milestone.
onboarding.resultProgressBar: This is the result progress bar. It shows you how much progress you have made so far.
onboarding.winTheDay: Win the day with priority actions
onboarding.wintTheDayBenefit: to help you focus on the most important actions and to gain a sense of accomplishment.
onboarding.calendar: This calendar show your working minutes and daily action completion. You can also plan ahead and navigate to the past.
